title: DeltaX Associate Product Engineer - 2024
content:
**Education:** **BTech CSE from Tier3 College**
**Years of Experience: 0
Prior Experience: Product Based Startup Internships and Open Source Experience**
**Company: DeltaX**
**Title/Level: Associate Product Engineer
Location: Pune/Hyderabad/Bangalore (options)
Salary: 516,000**
**Relocation/Signing Bonus: Nil
Stock bonus: Nil
Bonus: 140,000 + 15000(Gratuity)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 671,000**
**Benefits: 30000 Non Encashable (Food/Snacks/HI)
Other details: 90 Days Notice Period**

Just Excepted the offer as market condition, but obviously looking for better options

title: OCI | IC2 | January 2024 | Bengaluru
content:
Education: Tier - 3 College
Years of Experience: 2 year 1 month
Prior Experience: SW Engineer at product based company
Previous Compensation: 20 LPA CTC
Date of the Offer: December 2023
Company: Oracle, OCI 
Title/Level: IC2
Location: Bangalore, India
Salary: 26,00,000
PF+Gratuity: 1,40,000
Relocation assistance : NA
Performance Bonus: NA
Joining Bonus: 2,00,000 (1st month) + 2,00,000 (12th month)
Stock bonus: 40000 USD (8,00,000 / yr )
Total comp (Salary + Joining Bonus + Stock + Reimbursements) 1st year : 37,40,000/-
Benefits: Medical Insurance other standard OCI benefits.

title: Offer Comparisons Wayfair Vs Google
content:
YOE: 2.5+ 
Education - BTech from Tier 1

Current Comp: 30.8 LPA (includes PF) + Bonus (which is not fixed)
Company: Top MNC (Fintech)
Title/Level: SDE2

Offer 1:
Company: Google
Title/Level: SDE1 (Down leveled)
Base: 26 LPA 
Perf Bonus: 3.9 LPA (15%)
Bonus: 5 Joining + 1.7 Relocation Bonus (Both has to be returned on prorated basis if left within 12 months)
Stocks: 51K USD
Benefits: 3.6 LPA (PF + Medical benefits + Google standard)
CTC: 55.7 LPA


Offer 2:
Company: Wayfair
Title/Level: SDE - L2
Salary: 40 LPA
Relocation/Signing Bonus: N/A
Stock: N/A
Bonus: N/A
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): INR 40 LPA
Benefits: N/A

Need some advice about which company should I go for? Please suggest based on Growth > Work Culture > WLB considering level offered + comp .

Going for google means waiting for 1.5 years on average for the promotion and won't have any hike unless promoted since this comp is already max out. Cannot leave mid way after joining Google because that would mean returning Signing + Relocation Bonus and not getting any stocks and base is already less than what I am getting currently.

Wayfair is fairly new in India? How is the growth, work, WLB, work culture?

Also, expecting offer from Cohesity. How is the company, work and WLB there? What comp can be expected from Cohesity?

Please let me know if there are any other suggestions.
